CustomField.formula: IF( !ISBLANK(Shipping_Address_Line_1__c), Shipping_Address_Line_1__c & BR(), "") & IF( !ISBLANK(Shipping_Address_Line_2__c), Shipping_Address_Line_2__c & BR(), "") & IF( !ISBLANK(Shipping_Address_Line_3__c), Shipping_Address_Line_3__c & BR(), "") & IF( (!ISBLANK(Shipping_City__c)&& !ISBLANK(Shipping_Zip_Postal_Code__c)), Shipping_City__c &", " & Shipping_Zip_Postal_Code__c & BR(), IF( (ISBLANK(Shipping_City__c)&& !ISBLANK(Shipping_Zip_Postal_Code__c)) , Shipping_Zip_Postal_Code__c & BR(), IF( (!ISBLANK(Shipping_City__c)&& ISBLANK(Shipping_Zip_Postal_Code__c)) , Shipping_City__c & BR(), ""))) & IF( !ISBLANK(Shipping_State_Province__c), Shipping_State_Province__c & BR(), "")
CustomField.label: Shipping Address
